summary: Former bootlegger Remy Marco has a slight problem with forclosing bankers, a prospective son-in-law, and four hard-to-explain corpses.
cast: Edward G. Robinson|Jane Bryan|Allen Jenkins|Ruth Donnelly|Willard Parker|John Litel|Edward Brophy|Harold Huber|Eric Stanley|Paul Harvey|Bobby Jordan|Joe Downing|Margaret Hamilton|George E. title: A Slight Case of Murder
